assumptions.red: hot-headed, fiery, and the life of the party
assumptions.triangle: witty but prone to bouts of prickliness
assumptions.square: good with following instructions and fitting in with the crowd
assumptions.fast: live on wild side, never slowing down for anything
assumptions.normal: live life in the moment, and think planning is an annoyance
assumptions.slow: take things at their own pace, and save tasks til the last minute
